isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - INNER DOOR HANDLE

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Side Inner Door Handle

step1.para:
Remove drive side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 55 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide retaining clip (Item 1) off inner door handle control rod (Item 2), and remove it from inner door handle (Item 3).

Remove two hex nuts and washers (Item 4) from threaded studs and remove inner door handle (Item 3) and inner door handle mounting bracket (Item 5) from upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 6). Save for reinstallation.

figure.caption: Figure 55. Driver Side Inner Door Handle and Bracket

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
7. ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH CONNECTOR

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Side Inner Door Handle

step1.para:
Remove passenger side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 56 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide retaining clip (Item 1) off inner door handle control rod (Item 2), and remove it from inner door handle (Item 3).

Remove two hex nuts and washers (Item 4) from threaded studs and remove inner door handle (Item 3) and inner door handle mounting bracket (Item 5) from upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 6). Save for reinstallation.

figure.caption: Figure 56. Passenger Side Inner Door Handle and Bracket

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
7. ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH CONNECTOR
